alert.note: Alert for Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:01PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Jones, southeastern Craven, western Carteret and southwestern Pamlico Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 301 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kuhns, or 12 miles northeast of Piney Green, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Croatan, Wildwood, Catfish Lake, Neuse Forest, Cherry Branch Ferry Terminal, Minnesott Beach Ferry and Minnesott Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
